text: Martinstown Castle is a ruined castle located in the townland of Martinstown, south of Delvin, County Westmeath, Ireland. The ruin consists of a three-story tower with an interior staircase. Due to similarities with Talbot's Castle in Trim, County Meath, the castle is believed to date back to the 15th Century. == See also == * Delvin (civil parish) == References == Category:Irish castle stubs Category:Castles in Ireland Category:Castles in County Westmeath
title: Martinstown Castle
